title: MUSA 5080 Portfolio
text:
This portfolio documents my learning journey in Public Policy Analytics (MUSA 5080).


Advanced spatial analysis and data science for urban planning and public policy.




Weekly Notes: My learning reflections and key concepts
Labs: Completed assignments and analyses
Final Project: Capstone modeling challenge




My name is Mackenna Amole. I am a first-year MCP student with a concentration in Urban Design. I have a B.S. in Architecture from the University of Pittsburgh, completed in May 2025. I am taking this course to further develop my coding abilities and to strengthen my skills outside of design.




Email: mamole@upenn.edu
GitHub: @mamole27
